petplace.description: A digital platform focused on pet care, aiming to be a one-stop-shop for pet owners. It provides resources for adoption, pet insurance, lost pet support, and informative content.

shelterbuddy.description: A platform for pet shelters to connect with potential adopters, fostering a sense of community and support for pets in need of a loving home.

simplyas.description: A company that promotes an innovative work model, emphasizing communities and technology for the post-digital era.
